snippet: Forget the latest addition to Andy Murray's creaking trophy cabinet, the $2.4 million check and the adulation of a nation, the most significant upshot of his ATP World Tour Finals victory over Novak Djokovic is the aura it brings....
lead_paragraph: Forget the latest addition to Andy Murray's creaking trophy cabinet, the $2.4 million check and the adulation of a nation, the most significant upshot of his ATP World Tour Finals victory over Novak Djokovic is the aura it brings.

headline.print_headline: Murray to Take Aura of Invincibility Into New Year
headline.main: Murray to Take Aura of Invincibility Into New Year
